solution_line_template: Each table takes {pieces_per_table} pieces of wood to make so {num_tables} tables will take {num_tables}*{pieces_per_table} = <<{pieces_per_table}*{num_tables}={wood_for_tables}>>{wood_for_tables}

There were originally {total_wood_pieces} pieces of wood so now there are {total_wood_pieces}-{wood_for_tables} = <<{total_wood_pieces}-{wood_for_tables}={remaining_wood}>>{remaining_wood} pieces left
{pieces_per_chair} pieces of wood make 1 chair so {remaining_wood} pieces can make {remaining_wood}/{pieces_per_chair} = <<{remaining_wood}/{pieces_per_chair}={num_chairs}>>{num_chairs} chairs
